properties.name: custom.system.wall-length
properties.description: The length of the room (in meters).

properties.name: custom.system.particles-amount
properties.description: The amount of small particles in the space (i.e The N value).

properties.name: custom.system.small-particles-radius
properties.description: The radius of the small particles (in meters).

properties.name: custom.system.small-particles-mass
properties.description: The mass of the small particles (in kilograms).

properties.name: custom.system.big-particle-radius
properties.description: The radius of the big particle (in meters).

properties.name: custom.system.big-particle-mass
properties.description: The mass of the big particle (in kilograms).

properties.name: custom.simulation.duration
properties.description: The duration of the simulation (in seconds).

properties.name: custom.simulation.output-interval
properties.description: The duration of the output interval (i.e dt2) (in seconds).

properties.name: custom.output.raw
properties.description: The path for the raw file.

properties.name: custom.output.ovito
properties.description: The path for the Ovito file.

properties.name: custom.output.octave-time
properties.description: The path for the Octave time series file.

properties.name: custom.output.octave-events
properties.description: The path for the Octave events file.
